page.title: 03PLOCKTON PRIMARY SCHOOL.
page.content: { PLOCKTON P.S.}IS A SMALL VILLAGE SCHOOL WITH 2 TEACHERS AND 38 PUPILS. IT IS AN OLD STONE BUILDING WITH LEADED WINDOWS.IT WAS BUILT JUST AFTER 1872 AND LOOKS A BIT LIKE A CHURCH. AT ONE TIME IT WAS A{SECONDARY SCHOOL} AS WELL, BUT A NEW HIGH SCHOOL WAS BUILT ABOUT 20 YEARS AGO. VISITING TEACHERS COME TO TEACH{ {GAELIC,RECORDER,PIPING,ART AND P.E.} IN THE INFANT ROOM THERE ARE 22 PUPILS,IN CLASS 1 AND 2,AND IN THE "BIG" ROOM THERE ARE 16 IN CLASSES 3 TO 7.TEN PUPILS COME EACH DAY IN A MINIBUS BECAUSE THEY LIVE OUTSIDE PLOCKTON AT{ {DUNCRAIG,ACHNANDARACH,DUIRINISH}AND {DRUMBUIE.} THE SIGN AT THE SCHOOL GATE IS WRITTEN IN{GAELIC AND ENGLISH.}IT READS{"BUN SGOIL A'PHLUIC".
